list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an instruction, command, or duty given to a person or group of people.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he received a commission to act as an informer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ông đã nhận được một ủy ban để làm một người cung cấp thông tin

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group of people officially charged with a particular function.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the United Nations High Commission for Refugees
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ủy ban người tị nạn cao của Liên Hợp Quốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an amount of money, typically a set percentage of the value involved, paid to an agent in a commercial transaction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: foreign banks may charge a commission
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các ngân hàng nước ngoài có thể tính phí hoa hồng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a warrant conferring the rank of officer in an army, navy, or air force.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã từ chức Ủy ban của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the action of committing a crime or offense.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: use of a deadly weapon in the commission of a felony
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sử dụng vũ khí chết người trong Ủy ban trọng tội

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give an order for or authorize the production of (something such as a building, piece of equipment, or work of art).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the portrait was commissioned by his widow in 1792
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chân dung được ủy quyền bởi góa phụ của mình vào năm 1792

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bring (something newly produced, such as a factory or machine) into working condition.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we had a few hiccups getting the heating equipment commissioned
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã có một vài trục trặc có được thiết bị sưởi ấm được ủy quyền

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: appoint (someone) to the rank of officer in the armed services.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was commissioned after attending midshipman school
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã được ủy nhiệm sau khi tham dự trường Midshipman
